snippet: HOROWITZ--Estelle Meislik. July 31, 1919 - May 13, 2016. Treasured mother of Janice Horowitz Bookstaber and Bert Horowitz, grandmother to Michael and Daniel Horowitz and Anna Bookstaber. Beloved and admired for her strength, compassion and devotion to educators' rights. Estelle was Professor of Economics at Pratt Institute, founding President of its teacher's union and head of the United Federation of College Teachers. Our bright light of inspiration and fortitude, Estelle led with her intellectual acumen, ethics and heart. She survived her husband Sidney, and siblings Jules, Morris, Sidney, Harry, and Anne. Estelle passed away peacefully in her home. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HOROWITZ, ESTELLE MEISLIK
